title: Problem 2141_C
statement: There is a variable sum, which is initially equal to 0.There is also a data structure that can perform the following operations: pushback x — adds an element with value x to the end of the structure; pushfront x — adds an element with value x to the beginning of the structure; popback — removes the last element from the structure; popfront — removes the first element from the structure; min — adds the value of the minimum element currently in the structure to the variable sum. The operations pop
